title: 94/275/EC: Commission Decision of 18 April 1994 on recognizing rabies vaccines
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 April 1994 on recognizing rabies vaccines (94/275/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The vaccines recognized at Community level are those manufactured according to the protocols laid down in the monograph of the European Pharmacopoeia on vaccinum rabiei inactivatum ad usum veterinarium (rabies vaccine (inactivated) for  veterinary use).
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
